quality.reason: Rooms are small and minimalist with modern decor, but noise issues and maintenance lapses detract from the experience.

location.reason: Centrally located with convenient access to attractions, though signage and parking are problematic.

service.reason: Staff are friendly and accommodating, but slow responses and inconsistent housekeeping are noted.

safety.reason: Secure entry measures and a generally safe area, though street noise and thin walls may affect comfort.
